casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
SUAREZ S246411 Supreme Court of California MARCH 14, 2018 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. The matter is transferred to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Appellate District, with directions to vacate its decision and reconsider the cause in light of People v. Superior Court (Lara) (2018) 4 Cal.5th 299, 228 Cal.Rptr.3d 394, 410 P.3d 22. ( Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.528(d).)
